mapper.insert: insert into Content(title, remark, artical, picture, price) VALUES (#{title}, #{remark}, #{artical}, #{picture}, #{price})
mapper.delete: delete from Content where id = #{id} and id not in (select contentId from OrderContent) and id not in (select ContentId from Cart)
mapper.select: select id, title, remark, artical, picture, price, (select count(cnt) from OrderContent where contentId = #{id}) as cnt from Content where id = #{id}
select id, title, remark, artical, picture, A.price, sum(B.cnt) as cnt from Content A left join OrderContent B on A.id = B.contentId
